r.s: Handles talking to a sieve server.
r.d: This package provides an API to talk to servers implementing the managesieve protocol. It can be used to install and remove sieve scripts, mark them active etc.
r.n: * Query capabilities again after successful authentication (Jesse Crawford, Request #18382). * Escape quotes and backslashes in script names, and use literal strings for script names with non-ASCII characters (Aleksander Machniak, Bug #16691). * Work around broken STARTTLS behavior in Cyrus versions before 2.3.10 (Aleksander Machniak, Bug #18241). * Improve string literal parsing (Aleksander Machniak, Bug #18228).
